import React from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; export default function Home() { return (
{/* Hero Section */}
{/* Background Image with Zoom Animation */}

Discover the Past
Inspire the Future

Journey through time with our world-class collections.
Experience art, history, and culture like never before.

Book Tickets Now View Exhibitions
{/* Features Section */}

Why Visit Us?

{[ { title: "World-Class Exhibits", desc: "Over 100,000 artifacts from every corner of the globe.", icon: "ðŸŒ", img: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1554907984-15263bfd63bd?q=80&w=800&auto=format&fit=crop" }, { title: "Interactive Tours", desc: "Augmented reality guides and immersive audio tours.", icon: "ðŸŽ§", img: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1596526131083-e8c633c948d2?q=80&w=800&auto=format&fit=crop" }, { title: "Smart Booking", desc: "Skip the line with our AI-powered instant ticketing bot.", icon: "ðŸ¤–", img: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1531482615713-2afd69097998?q=80&w=800&auto=format&fit=crop" } ].map((feature, idx) => (
{feature.icon}

{feature.title}

{feature.desc}

))}
{/* Real-time Exhibitions Section */}

Modern Art Revolution

A journey through 20th century abstract expressionism.
